about_the_game:
Wanna Inside Her (bedroom) photos in your pocket?

This pack contains Inside Her (bedroom) sketches and the Gallery images in HD resolution. Check the first ideas for the scenes/characters and their final versions. Also, you can use the images to make your wallpapers and/or have fun without having to access the game. In other words, you'll get:


  • 6 HD scenes from Inside Her (bedroom);
  • 12 sketches (adult scenes and characters' sketches);

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Inside Her (bedroom)\Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: Contains partial and full nudity, and explicit sexual relations.

name: Inside Her (bedroom) - Art Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: All sketches from the creative process for Inside Her (bedroom) and the Gallery images in HD resolution so that you can make your own wallpapers and have fun without accessing the game.
